abstract: Qatar National Bank, which is 50 percent owned by the country's sovereign wealth fund, said it was in talks to acquire a controlling stake in Dexia's DenizBank.
snippet: Qatar National Bank, which is 50 percent owned by the country's sovereign wealth fund, said it was in talks to acquire a controlling stake in Dexia's DenizBank.
lead_paragraph: The state-backed Qatar National Bank is in talks to buy the Turkish division of Dexia, the struggling French-Belgian bank.

headline.main: Qatar Bank Seeks Turkish Unit of Struggling Dexia
